column1: Indicator Description: Asthma hospitalizations are more severe asthma outcomes. They're often clustered in high-poverty neighborhoods where disinvestment and poor housing conditions expose residents to triggers.
Notes: **Estimate is suppressed due to insufficient data..*Estimate is based on small numbers so should be interpreted with caution.
